CustomField.description: Will evaluate to true if this record is workable for Payroll
CustomField.formula: AND(Do_Not_Call__c = false , Email_Opt_Out__c = false , Out_of_Business__c = false , Benetrac_Indicator__c = false , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Oasis Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'PEO Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Ecommerce')) , (RecordType.DeveloperName ="CoreAccountRecordType" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "MMSAccountRecordType") , OR(ISBLANK(SensitivityList__c),NOT(CONTAINS(SensitivityList__c, "Payroll"))) , NOT(AdvancedPartnerClients__c) ,(ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_BenAdmin__c = false) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this box is checked, this prospect is workable for the Payroll rep. Do Not Call = False Email Opt Out = False Out of Business = False
CustomField.label: Payroll Workable
